alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Randolph and northwestern Chatham Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 820 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Asheboro, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Liberty, Ramseur, Franklinville, Staley, Randleman Regional Reservior Marina and Coleridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
